verses.plain: Masters, give unto your servants that which is just and equal; knowing that ye also have a Master in heaven.

tokens.t: Masters, give unto
servants that which is just and equal; knowing that ye also have a Master in heaven.

verses.plain: Continue in prayer, and watch in the same with thanksgiving;

tokens.t: Continue in prayer, and watch in the same with thanksgiving;

verses.plain: Withal praying also for us, that God would open unto us a door of utterance, to speak the mystery of Christ, for which I am also in bonds:

tokens.t: Withal praying also for us, that God would open unto us a door of utterance, to speak the mystery of Christ, for which I am also in bonds:

verses.plain: That I may make it manifest, as I ought to speak.

tokens.t: That I may make it manifest, as I ought to speak.

verses.plain: Walk in wisdom toward them that are without, redeeming the time.

tokens.t: Walk in wisdom toward them that are without, redeeming the time.

verses.plain: Let your speech be alway with grace, seasoned with salt, that ye may know how ye ought to answer every man.

tokens.t: Let your speech
alway with grace, seasoned with salt, that ye may know how ye ought to answer every man.

verses.plain: All my state shall Tychicus declare unto you, who is a beloved brother, and a faithful minister and fellowservant in the Lord:

tokens.t: All my state shall Tychicus declare unto you,
a beloved brother, and a faithful minister and fellowservant in the Lord:

verses.plain: Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose, that he might know your estate, and comfort your hearts;

tokens.t: Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose, that he might know your estate, and comfort your hearts;

verses.plain: With Onesimus, a faithful and beloved brother, who is one of you. They shall make known unto you all things which are done here.

tokens.t: With Onesimus, a faithful and beloved brother, who is
of you. They shall make known unto you all things which
here.

verses.plain: Aristarchus my fellowprisoner saluteth you, and Marcus, sister’s son to Barnabas, (touching whom ye received commandments: if he come unto you, receive him;)

tokens.t: Aristarchus my fellowprisoner saluteth you, and Marcus, sister’s son to Barnabas, (touching whom ye received commandments: if he come unto you, receive him;)

verses.plain: And Jesus, which is called Justus, who are of the circumcision. These only are my fellowworkers unto the kingdom of God, which have been a comfort unto me.

tokens.t: And Jesus, which is called Justus, who are of the circumcision. These only
fellowworkers unto the kingdom of God, which have been a comfort unto me.

verses.plain: Epaphras, who is one of you, a servant of Christ, saluteth you, always labouring fervently for you in prayers, that ye may stand perfect and complete in all the will of God.

tokens.t: Epaphras, who is
of you, a servant of Christ, saluteth you, always labouring fervently for you in prayers, that ye may stand perfect and complete in all the will of God.

verses.plain: For I bear him record, that he hath a great zeal for you, and them that are in Laodicea, and them in Hierapolis.

tokens.t: For I bear him record, that he hath a great zeal for you, and them
in Laodicea, and them in Hierapolis.

verses.plain: Luke, the beloved physician, and Demas, greet you.

tokens.t: Luke, the beloved physician, and Demas, greet you.

verses.plain: Salute the brethren which are in Laodicea, and Nymphas, and the church which is in his house.

tokens.t: Salute the brethren which are in Laodicea, and Nymphas, and the church which is in his house.

verses.plain: And when this epistle is read among you, cause that it be read also in the church of the Laodiceans; and that ye likewise read the epistle from Laodicea.

tokens.t: And when this epistle is read among you, cause that it be read also in the church of the Laodiceans; and that ye likewise read the
from Laodicea.

verses.plain: And say to Archippus, Take heed to the ministry which thou hast received in the Lord, that thou fulfil it.

tokens.t: And say to Archippus, Take heed to the ministry which thou hast received in the Lord, that thou fulfil it.

verses.plain: The salutation by the hand of me Paul. Remember my bonds. Grace be with you. Amen.

tokens.t: The salutation by the hand of me Paul. Remember my bonds. Grace
with you. Amen.
